name: Old-Fashioned Butterscotch Sauce
keywords: butter, dark brown sugar, heavy cream, dessert, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 cup dark brown sugar, not too firmly packed

recipeInstructions.text: In a heavy-bottomed saucepan or an enameled cast-iron pot, combine butter and sugar over medium heat and cook until sugar has melted completely and mixture has taken on a thick frothy appearance, 5 to 10 minutes. Turn off heat.
Thoroughly whisk in cream. Let cool for 10 minutes, then add vanilla, vinegar and salt. Taste and adjust seasonings.
